trans-unit.source: You will be redirected to the login page in a few seconds.
trans-unit.target: Serás redirixida á páxina de inicio de sesión nuns segundos.

trans-unit.source: Please, check your mailbox.
trans-unit.target: Por favor, comproba o teu correo electrónico.

trans-unit.source: A link to reset your password has been sent to you.
trans-unit.target: Envióuseche unha ligazón para restablece-lo teu contrasinal.

trans-unit.source: For security reasons, you cannot connect to the back office until you have:
trans-unit.target: Por razóns de seguridade, non pode acceder ó panel de administración ata que:

trans-unit.source: deleted the /install folder
trans-unit.target: borrar a carpeta /install

trans-unit.source: renamed the /admin folder (e.g. %s)
trans-unit.target: cambiado o nome do directorio /admin (ex: %s)

trans-unit.source: Please then access this page by the new URL (e.g. %s)
trans-unit.target: Acceda logo a esta páxina mediante o novo URL (ex: %s)

trans-unit.source: For security reasons, you must also delete the /install folder.
trans-unit.target: Por razóns de seguridade, tamén debes elimina-lo cartafol /install.

trans-unit.source: SSL is activated. However, your IP is allowed to enter unsecure mode for maintenance or local IP issues.
trans-unit.target: SSL está activo. Porén, permíteselle á súa IP entrar nun modo inseguro para mantemento ou incidencias da IP local.

trans-unit.source: SSL is activated. Please connect using the following link to [1]log in to secure mode (https://)[/1]
trans-unit.target: SSL está activo. Conéctese utilizando o enlace a continuación para [1]iniciar sesión nun modo seguro (https://)[/1]

trans-unit.source: The employee does not exist, or the password provided is incorrect.
trans-unit.target: Ou o empregado non existe ou ben o contrasinal proporcionado é incorrecto.

trans-unit.source: This employee does not manage the shop anymore (either the shop has been deleted or permissions have been revoked).
trans-unit.target: Este/a empregado/a xa non xestionará máis a tenda (ou ben se eliminou a tenda ou ben os permisos foron retirados).

trans-unit.source: This account does not exist.
trans-unit.target: Esta conta non existe.
trans-unit.note: Line: 339 Comment: check matching employee id with its email

trans-unit.source: You can reset your password every %interval% minute(s) only. Please try again later.
trans-unit.target: Só pode restablecer o seu contrasinal cada %interval% minuto(s). Ténteo de novo máis tarde.

trans-unit.source: Please, check your mailbox. A link to reset your password has been sent to you.
trans-unit.target: Por favor, comproba o teu correo. Envióuseche unha ligazón para restablece-lo teu contrasinal.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while attempting to reset your password.
trans-unit.target: Produciuse un erro ó tentar restablece-lo contrasinal.

trans-unit.source: Some identification information is missing.
trans-unit.target: Desapareceu algunha información da identificación.

trans-unit.source: The password is missing: please enter your new password.
trans-unit.target: Desapareceu o contrasinal: introduza o novo contrasinal.

trans-unit.source: The password is not in a valid format.
trans-unit.target: O contrasinal non está nun formato válido.

trans-unit.source: The confirmation is empty: please fill in the password confirmation as well.
trans-unit.target: A confirmación está baleira: cubra tamén a confirmación do contrasinal.

trans-unit.source: The password and its confirmation do not match. Please double check both passwords.
trans-unit.target: O contrasinal e a súa confirmación non coinciden. Faga unha comprobación dobre de ámbolos contrasinais.

trans-unit.source: Your password reset request expired. Please start again.
trans-unit.target: Caducou a petición de restablecemento do contrasinal. Comece de novo.
trans-unit.note: Line: 344 Comment: To update password, we must have the temporary reset token that matches.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while attempting to change your password.
trans-unit.target: Houbo un erro ó tentar cambiar o contrasinal.

trans-unit.source: The password has been changed successfully.
trans-unit.target: Mudouse o contrasinal correctamente.
